original: Akusalaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
